scripts.itai-migrate-db-schema: C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysqldump.exe -u root --no-data site2 > schema.sql && copy C:\xampp\htdocs\site2\schema.sql C:\xampp\htdocs\site2\db
scripts.itai-migrate-db-data: C:/xampp/mysql/bin/mysqldump.exe -u root site2 > data.sql && copy C:\xampp\htdocs\site2\data.sql C:\xampp\htdocs\site2\db
scripts.migrate-db: npm run migrate-db-data && npm run migrate-db-schema
